snippet.title: Wandness Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Craft wands, create synergies, battle monsters, and survive. Dive into the depths of magic crafting, where you'll forge spells from magical components and elemental gems for endless combinations. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and unleash your magic madness to overcome the darkness.

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2928690/Wandness/
